title: Tobin Litho trade cards for sale......
author: autograf

posts.post_title: Tobin Litho trade cards for sale......
posts.post_content:
Lot of (4) Tobin Lithographs from the 1880's including Baby Anson, Baby Bunting, Little Mascot & Mull Tobin.  About EX but some wear, staining or paper on the blank backs.  Still VERY nice for the issue.  Advertising Royal Shoe on the front of the card at the top.  Matched group of 4.  $175

Baby Anson Tobin Lithograph advertising John A. Tolman Co's Katosa Coffee. About VGEX with blank back.  $90.

All prices postpaid/insured.  Paypal accepted.  Email to confirm.  

[IMG]http://i70.photobucket.com/albums/i91/autograf99/baby_anson.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i70.photobucket.com/albums/i91/autograf99/wed5.jpg[/IMG]
